channel.title: Comments on: Why Job Applications Suck

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/why-job-applications-suck-2/#comment-35">Albertonykus</a>.
Awesome! I'm so taking a chameleon the next time I'm doing field work..!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Albertonykus.

Awesome! I’m so taking a chameleon the next time I’m doing field work..!

item.title: By: Albertonykus
item.dc:creator: Albertonykus
item.description: Chameleons have opposable "thumbs"... though better for gripping branches than anything else: http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4104/5020563551_fc06507af1.jpg
item.content:encoded: Chameleons have opposable “thumbs”… though better for gripping branches than anything else: http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4104/5020563551_fc06507af1.jpg

item.title: By: Heinrich Mallison
item.dc:creator: Heinrich Mallison
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/why-job-applications-suck-2/#comment-33">protohedgehog</a>.
I see him at lunch every now and then. Nice guy!
Yes, I will cooperate with Richard, if I get the funding for the trace fossil project I plan on the Triassic of Europe.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to protohedgehog.

I see him at lunch every now and then. Nice guy!

Yes, I will cooperate with Richard, if I get the funding for the trace fossil project I plan on the Triassic of Europe.

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/why-job-applications-suck-2/#comment-32">Heinrich Mallison</a>.
Yep, the PhD on archosauromorph macroevolution. Do you work/collaborate with him then?
Berlin does seem to be the place to be atm. I've just applied for another PhD with Phil Mannion who's doing a fellowship there, if you know him..?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Heinrich Mallison.

Yep, the PhD on archosauromorph macroevolution. Do you work/collaborate with him then?

Berlin does seem to be the place to be atm. I’ve just applied for another PhD with Phil Mannion who’s doing a fellowship there, if you know him..?

item.title: By: Heinrich Mallison
item.dc:creator: Heinrich Mallison
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/why-job-applications-suck-2/#comment-31">protohedgehog</a>.
with Richard Butler? email me if you are interested in finding a job for you in Berlin.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to protohedgehog.

with Richard Butler?
email me if you are interested in finding a job for you in Berlin.

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/why-job-applications-suck-2/#comment-30">Heinrich Mallison</a>.
Ich habe zwei schwestern. Ich liebe bier.
Why does everything good have to be in Germany?! (women, beer, palaeontology..) :p I did recently apply for one in Munich, but my friend (who is considerably smarter than me) got it instead. In the mean-time, it's just moar scheiße job applications..
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Heinrich Mallison.

Ich habe zwei schwestern. Ich liebe bier.

Why does everything good have to be in Germany?! (women, beer, palaeontology..) :p I did recently apply for one in Munich, but my friend (who is considerably smarter than me) got it instead. In the mean-time, it’s just moar scheiße job applications..

item.title: By: Heinrich Mallison
item.dc:creator: Heinrich Mallison
item.description:
Hear, hear!
You know, there is a lot of funding to be had for a no-nonsense researchers, once you have a PhD, or a great project idea for getting one. It has only one snag..... you hafe to lern zome Germann, jawoll!
item.content:encoded:
Hear, hear!

You know, there is a lot of funding to be had for a no-nonsense researchers, once you have a PhD, or a great project idea for getting one. It has only one snag….. you hafe to lern zome Germann, jawoll!
